column2: Oh, hello there. You're back! Can I help you with something?
As a matter of fact, you can!

So, Faber, about that stealth device you mentioned. Just as an experiment, how about if we make one?

Not that we'd ever use it for real or anything!

Oh, yeah, the stealth device. Hmmm. These are very tricky, but I have studied them quite extensively. 

Pretty sure I can make one for you. For experimentation only! 

Riley, my friend, promise me, you're not going to get in any kind of trouble with it, are you?
Trouble? Us? Faber, you know I never get into trouble ;)

OK, just making sure. I'll have to get my hands on a few necessary components.

I'm going to need you two to get me a *hush gasket* and a *ratchet wheel* the size of a penny. 

Oh, right, and a small quantity of *cloaking glaze*. Think you can find those things?
Sure. We're on it. Thanks, Faber!
